meanings.sent1: Her outfit was so unfashionable that it stood out in a bad way.
meanings.sent2: The old hat she wore was unfashionable compared to the trendy ones.
meanings.sent3: Despite her unfashionable attire, she confidently walked down the street.
meanings.sent4: His taste in music was as unfashionable as wearing a winter coat in summer.
meanings.sent5: The unfashionable dress she wore made her feel out of place at the party.

meanings.sent1: The plain and unfashionable curtains did not match the room's decor.
meanings.sent2: His unfashionable haircut made him look older than he was.
meanings.sent3: She tried to make the unfashionable sweater look chic by adding accessories.
meanings.sent4: The unfashionable furniture in the waiting room made it feel outdated.
meanings.sent5: The unfashionable design of the building made it blend into the background.
